import React from 'react' export default function Table1({data,setData,sendmessage}) { const handleclick = () =>{ setData({...data,isEdit:true}); } const handleSubmit = () => { sendmessage(data); setData({...data,isEdit:false}) } return (
S.no Name Age Email Edit Remove
{0} {data.name} {data.age} {data.email} {data.isEdit ?:}
) }
